text: Badnaam, is a Pakistani Urdu language movie, the movie was released on September 2, 1966. Badnaam was based on Saadat Hasan Manto's short story "Jhumkay" ("earrings"). It was adapted for the screen by Riaz Shahid. The movie was directed and produced by Iqbal Shehzad, It is his debut movie as a director. Badnaam starred Allaudin, Nabeela, Neelo, Ejaz, Diljeet Mirza, Hamid Wain and Rangela. Category:1960s Pakistani movies Category:1966 movies Category:Urdu-language movies
title: Badnaam (1966 movie)
